item.title: 317 pi ip help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Replace
//cl.playerServer = “riotscape.no-ip.info”;

With
//cl.playerServer = “PUT YOUR NO-IP”;

FYI quit making multiple threads!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pi ip help
item.dc:creator: @Dohn Dohn
item.description:
@Dohn wrote:

im sorry…
well this is only thing that is screwing me
…StaticPacketBuilder bldr = new StaticPacketBuilder();
bldr.setBare(true);
bldr.addByte((byte) returnCode);
if(returnCode == 2) {
cl.saveCharacter = true;
if(cl.playerRights == 3) {
bldr.addByte((byte) 2);
} else {
bldr.addByte((byte) cl.playerRights);
}
//cl.playerServer = “riotscape.no-ip.info”;
} else if(returnCode == 21) {
bldr.addByte((byte) loginDelay);
} else {
bldr.addByte((byte) 0);
}
this is the only ip in my file (server sided) somone help?
when i take the // and put my local an error pops up pointing at the (.) after cl
a

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pi ip help
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

if you have portforwarded then they need to be YOUR ip to let other players log on…so go to:

WhatIsMyIP.com®

What Is My IP? Shows your real IP - IPv4 - IPv6 - WhatIsMyIP.com®

IPv4 Address, IPv6 Address, IP Address Lookup, Change IP, Hide IP, IP WHOIS, Internet Speed Test, Trace An Email, Host Name Lookup, User Agent, Server Headers Check, IP Commands

copy/paste your ip into those spots…compile…done

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pi ip help

item.description:

           [b]   the only ip is [/b]

…StaticPacketBuilder bldr = new StaticPacketBuilder();
bldr.setBare(true);
bldr.addByte((byte) returnCode);
if(returnCode == 2) {
cl.saveCharacter = true;
if(cl.playerRights == 3) {
bldr.addByte((byte) 2);
} else {
bldr.addByte((byte) cl.playerRights);
}
//cl.playerServer = “riotscape.no-ip.info”;
} else if(returnCode == 21) {
bldr.addByte((byte) loginDelay);
} else {
bldr.addByte((byte) 0);
}
